page.title: 12Street Names in Westhill.
page.content:
The street names of Westhill are based on names of people,places and trees.
Some streets are named after the{first {residents}who had to move to make way for new building developements.The Residents Commitee thought that this was a good idea of maintaining the past.
The streets named after{trees}indicate these houses were built by Barratt. Kinmundy is an area in Westhill which was named after the Mains of Kinmundy which is round about the Brodiach Road where the House of Kinmundy is.
{Old Skene Road}was the original main road between Aberdeen and Alford. Westhill Drive is the main street within Westhill today.The residents that were moved now live there.{
